svg.title: Digital Certificate of Authenticity for The Ride Never Ends fine silver coins minted in 2022.

svg.text: This DCoA certifies and guarantees that the original holder was a
recipient of coin number X (out of Y) from the initial minting of
The Ride Never Ends fine silver coins minted in 2022 as part of
the Silver Mare Coin project on /mlp/.
